text: Héctor Pulido Rodríguez (20 December 1942 – 18 February 2022) was a Mexican football player and manager. He played as a midfielder. He played for the Mexico national team between 1967 and 1973. Pulido died on 18 February 2022, at the age of 79.Luto en Cruz Azul, fallece Héctor Pulido Leyenda de La Máquina Celeste ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican football managers Category:Mexican footballers
title: Héctor Pulido
